CustomField.description: Given config is used to show alert if non zero value in entered on the timecard section for the day marked as holiday (having zero hours) in the selected Resource work calendar.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Given config is used to show alert if non zero value in entered on the timecard section for the day marked as holiday (having zero hours) in the selected Resource work calendar.
CustomField.label: Show Alert For NonZero HolidayHours
